      • destroyGameObject

        public void destroyGameObject(GameObjectManager.GObject gameObject)

        Removes the given GObject from lookup and detaches all its Components.

        Parameters:
        gameObject - to destroy.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if game object is null.

      • destroyGameObject

        public boolean destroyGameObject(int id)

        Removes the GObject associated with the given id from lookup and detaches all its Components.

        Parameters:
        id - game object id.
        Returns:
        false if no game object identified with the specified id.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if id < 0 or id >= the number of game objects.

      • destroyGameObject

        public boolean destroyGameObject(int id,
                                 int version)

        Removes the GObject associated with the given id and version from lookup and detaches all its Components.

        Parameters:
        id - game object id.
        version - game object version.
        Returns:
        false if no game object identified with the specified id and version.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if id or version < 0 or id >= the number of game objects.

      • getPattern

        public ComponentPattern getPattern(Class<? extends ComponentManager.Component>... classes)

        Gets a ComponentPattern whose game objects are composed of the components referred to by the given component Class objects.

        Parameters:
        classes - component classes.
        Returns:
        pattern.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if one of the Class objects directly represents ComponentManager.Component.
